Case_Structure
Class Case_Library

java.lang.Object
  Case_Structure.Case_Library

public class Case_Library
extends java.lang.Object

Case Library structure. In charge of storing and managing all the CBR cases and any of their related information.

Author:
Marc Bola–os

createCase

private void createCase(int domain_pos,
                        java.lang.String values,
                        java.lang.String names,
                        java.lang.String types,
                        java.lang.String att_sol,
                        TextFileReader reader,
                        int line_pos)
Creates a new case using the text file String information passed by parameter adds it into the Case_Library.

Parameters:
domain_pos - int with the position of the domain in the domain_list.
values - separated by commas.
names - abstract names separated by commas.
types - Java types string representation separated by commas.
att_sol - 'a' or 's' indicating if each element is an attribute or a solution.
reader - TextReader for managing the formated data.
line_pos - int with the line position

createCaseSubsolutions

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> createCaseSubsolutions(java.lang.String value,
                                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                                     java.lang.String type,
                                                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> hierarchy,
                                                                     Domain domain,
                                                                     Case new_case,
                                                                     int sol_pos,
                                                                     TextFileReader reader)
This recursive method adds all the sub-solutions in the corresponding case.

Parameters:
value - solution value String representation to add.
name - solution name String representation to add.
type - solution type String representation to add.
hierarchy - ArrayList with the position of the current sub-solution in the hierarchy.
domain - Domain that the case belongs to.
new_case - Case being created.
sol_pos - int position of the main solution where the sub-solutions will be added.
reader - TextFileReader for reading the String representations of value, name and type.
Returns:
ArrayList
